experiences.description: The FundaÃ§Ã£o Getulio Vargas is one of the most important educational and research institutions in Brazil, where I had the opportunity to work in the Diretoria de AnÃ¡lise de PolÃ­ticas PÃºblicas (FGV DAPP).
list: Development of the 'observa2018' webapp for monitoring the 2018 Brazilian presidential elections reactions on social media. The project was a success and was highlighted by the press. Developed with vue.js and Node.js, the app had PWA and Push Notification features which allowed real-time view of mentions of the candidates on social media.
Development of dashboards focused on data analysis aimed at public policies, using javascript, d3.js.
Redesign of the board's institutional website, made with wordpress and PHP.
Implementation of the board's design system, in addition to several internal projects.

experiences.name: Sinapse tecnologias educacionais
experiences.description: Sinapse is a company that has been operating for over 30 years in the educational technology market. There I had the opportunity to work on the implementation of websites for educational institutions.
